<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Blue Viper (Level 16)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1493)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 36</row>

**Perception** +30; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43), [Ysoki](/Languages.aspx?ID=61)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +25, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +29, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +27

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +5

**Con** +6

**Int** +5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Infused Items** Blue Viper carries the following infused items: 2 [greater acid flasks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), 4 [greater alchemist's fires](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), 6 [blightburn resins](/Equipment.aspx?ID=108), 4 [greater bottled lightnings](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), 3 [deathcap powders](/Equipment.aspx?ID=111), 4 [greater elixirs of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), 2 [greater frost vial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77), 3 [malyass root pastes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=122), 9 [purple worm venoms](/Equipment.aspx?ID=126), 6 [shadow essences](/Equipment.aspx?ID=288), and 3 [spider roots](/Equipment.aspx?ID=129). These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time Blue Viper makes his daily preparations.

**Items**
[Dragon Bile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=112) (applied to body), _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +30 

**Ref** +29 

**Will** +24 

</row>

**HP** 300

**Poisoned Coat** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature adjacent to Blue Viper hits him with a melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike; **Effect** The triggering creature is exposed to [dragon bile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=112). This consumes the poison and Blue Viper can't use Poisoned Coat again until he spends 10 minutes applying one dose of contact or injury poison to his clothing.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_shortsword_ +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d6+8 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
alchemical bomb +31 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** varies by bomb

**Quick Application** <actions string="Single Action" />  Blue Viper Interacts to draw an [injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97) poison and applies it to a weapon he is holding.

**Pinpoint Poisoner**   When Blue Viper successfully Strikes a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature with a poisoned weapon or exposes a flat-footed creature to an [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) poison, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.

**Poison Spray** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Blue Viper is holding a [contact](/Traits.aspx?ID=37) or [injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97) poison; **Effect** Blue Viper swigs the poison and sprays it out of his mouth, affecting a 15- foot cone. Blue Viper is not exposed to the poison. All creatures in the cone are immediately exposed to the poison and each creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the poison.

**Potent Poisoner**   Blue Viper's infused poisons have a DC of 37.

**Toxic Escape** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Blue Viper Interacts to draw an [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) poison, deploys the poison in a smoke cloud that provides [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) in a 5-foot emanation, then [Sneaks](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) up to his Speed. He is not exposed to the inhaled poison.

</column>
name: Blue Viper (Level 16)
